Member Authenticate::ns_check_password ($password)

Just define blueLine in custdata.

Member DisplayLib::printfooterb ()
Only used with the old VB scale driver

Member MiscLib::pinghost ($host)
Doesn't work reliably in all environments. Use pingport().

Member PrehLib::endofShift ($json)

Member PrehLib::madCoupon ()

Member PrehLib::percentDiscount ($strl, $json=array())
Use discountnotify() instead. This just adds hard-coded percentages and PLUs that likely aren't applicable anywhere but the Wedge.

Member PrehLib::staffCharge ($arg, $json=array())

Member PrehLib::wmdiscount ()
Do not use this. The memType structure in custdata is a far better solution.
